org.fosstrak.hal.impl.impinj.comm
Class CRC8

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.hal.impl.impinj.comm.CRC8

public class CRC8
extends java.lang.Object

CRC8 calculates the CRC8 checksum with polynom x^8 + x^5 + x^4 + x^0 and preset 0x00.

Author:
Jonas Haller
